HEADING: Comment Moderation Settings
ENABLE_PROFANITY_DETECTION_DESCRIPTION: Comments are checked for profanity in real-time. Does not affect comments by administrators or moderators.
AUTO_SEND_PROFANE_TO_SPAM_LABEL: Automatically Send Profane Comments to Spam
AUTO_SEND_PROFANE_TO_SPAM_DESCRIPTION: Instead of being masked, profane comments (determined via the phrase blacklist) will be hidden and marked as spam.
ALLOW_PROFANE_NAMES_DESCRIPTION: When enabled, commenter names will not be checked for profanity or masked.
ENABLE_SPAM_DETECTION_DESCRIPTION: Spam detection happens in real-time. Comments that look like spam will be hidden. Moderators can review and approve them as needed. Admins and moderator comments are excluded.
BLOCK_SPAM_DESCRIPTION: Instead of allowing comments that look like spam, and approving them later, block them and tell the user to change their comment. The comments will not be submitted for moderation. For sites where the spam volume is too high to moderate.
SPAM_FILTER_DESCRIPTION_BAYES: With Naïve Bayes, you can use the spam filter everyone else uses, or isolate your spam filter training to just your tenant. Both continuously learn.
SPAM_FILTER_DESCRIPTION_LLM_AVAILABLE: Select LLM to use ChatGPT for spam detection (billed $<%= tenantPackage.flexChatGPTCostCents / 100 %> per 1k tokens). Only non-obvious spam is sent to OpenAI to reduce costs.
SPAM_FILTER_DESCRIPTION_LLM_UNAVAILABLE: ChatGPT-based spam detection is available for Flex (custom packages available).
AUTO_APPROVE_COMMENTS_DESCRIPTION: Changing this setting will not affect past comments.
ONLY_AUTO_APPROVE_VERIFIED_DESCRIPTION: Unverified comments won't show for anyone. Changing this setting will not affect past comments.
ONLY_AUTO_APPROVE_APPROVED_USERS_LABEL: Only Auto Approve For Approved Users
ONLY_AUTO_APPROVE_APPROVED_USERS_DESCRIP: With this, manual approval is required for the user's first comment. If a user has had a comment approved before, then their comment won't require manual approval.
AUTO_REMOVE_UNVERIFIED_DESCRIPTION_1: This will happen daily at 12AM PST.
AUTO_REMOVE_UNVERIFIED_DESCRIPTION_2: Manually approved, unverified comments, will not expire.
UNVERIFIED_TTL_LABEL: How long should we keep unverified comments?
UNVERIFIED_TTL_DESCRIPTION: Unverified comments are checked for removal daily at 12AM PST.
REPEAT_COMMENT_ACTION_DESCRIPTION: Optionally prevent spammers and abusive users from posting repeat comments.
AUTO_UNAPPROVE_FLAGGED_DESCRIPTION: Comments can be hidden if enough users flag them.
FLAGGED_THRESHOLD_LABEL: How many times should a comment being flagged result in it being un-approved?
FLAGGED_THRESHOLD_DESCRIPTION: Comments will be-unapproved after reaching this threshold. Being un-approved means it will not show.
FUTURE_COMMENTS_NOTE: Changing these settings will only affect future comments.
SPAM_PROFANITY_BLOG_LINK: Read more about FastComments Spam and Profanity filtering here.
COPY_TO_SUB_TENANTS_DESCRIPTION: Checking this will copy the settings to all sub tenants.
